data.title: Why didn't the Spartans have cavalry?
data.meta_description: Answer (1 of 2): They had but it was small and not very good. As for the size, it can be excused by the fact that most southern Greeks didn’t have much cavalry anyway. Still, one would expect something better than “hippeis” without any horses from the largest and most militarised state. So, what ...
